How to grade LLMs? 5 essential metrics:

1️⃣ Perplexity: Measures uncertainty.
2️⃣ BLEU: Compares to reference.
3️⃣ ROUGE: Evaluates summarization.
4️⃣ Humans: Expert judgment.
5️⃣ Task Specific: Goal performance.

How does AI understand you? 

Tokenization! 
Text breaks into "tokens" (words/sub-words), each getting a unique ID from a vocabulary. Like looking up a word, this ID is how LLMs understand. 
Tokenization: Text -> Tokens -> IDs (pre-defined vocab). Simple! 
#LLM #Tokenization #NLP

LLMs boosting support? 5 powerful use cases:

1️⃣ Chatbots: Automated convos.
2️⃣ FAQs: Quick answers.
3️⃣ Sentiment: Understand emotion.
4️⃣ Personalize: Tailored exp.
5️⃣ Auto Tickets: Streamline workflow.
